prompt: Premium luxury banner for a SaaS product called 'Condo Manager OS'. Dark navy blue gradient background with subtle gold accents. Clean modern typography. Show a stylized isometric 3D illustration of a luxury residential building with floating UI cards around it showing dashboards, financial charts, and notification badges. Include subtle icons: a gear, a chart, a shield, a key. Text overlay area on the left side (leave space for title). Professional, minimal, tech-forward aesthetic. No people. Aspect ratio 3:2 landscape. High-end product marketing style similar to Notion or Linear marketing materials.
